channel.title: Low FPS
channel.description:
I have huge fps drop at the moment when I first met woman assassin, right when I enter some kind of open hangar. I've lowered all graphic options and turned of all unnecessary programs. And still fraps shows ~5 fps. The whole game was running smooth on high def until that moment. I've checked and I pass all the recommended system requirements.
Ok.... I have no idea how this happend, but somehow after I killed 2 assassins and then pulled the lever upstairs everything started to run smooth...
So now I have tha same problem in teleportation chamber. I can't do nothing because I have fps ~5.

item.title: Low FPS
item.dc:creator: Lothlorien
item.description:
Same issue pretty much right after the assassin kill the cop. Also gets low at other parts of the game but not nearly as bad as this point.

My setup:

Intel Q9450 3.0Ghz
Nvidia GTX 460 1gb
4gb DDR2
Installed on a OCZ 120gb SSD.

I torrented the game, could files be corrupted?

Read full topic

item.title: Low FPS
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
Try loading a savegame from earlier on (when the game was running fine), after re-starting the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Low FPS
item.dc:creator: krabich
item.description:
I have same problem. Even at lowest resolution, low textures, low shadows and so on.
HW config is: C2D@2.2GHz, 2Gb RAM, Nvidia 9600GT 512Mb

Read full topic
